snippet.title: Turnabout 4 Kids - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
When the principal of Blackburn Elementary is murdered one night, Phoenix takes the case of local student and Pearl's classmate, Tommy Wilkins. A seemingly simple shooting quickly spirals out of control before culminating in a finale of emotion and grudge that leaves the concept being permanently expelled from Blackburn Elementary a pleasant afterthought.

Turnabout 4 Kids is the third case in the crossover series Phoenix Wright: Legal Panels and is loosely based off of the webcomic series Law 4 Kids. As befitting a proper case three, Turnabout 4 Kids offers a ridiculous 3 day case with 16 testimonies and over 5,000 lines of wholly unnecessary dialogue.

A video playthrough of the entire story can be found at https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLbl0_HnTWZbwaI9tjjHLos8zTZgF1TNmr

The series itself and the downloads to play it can also be found on the Court Records games forum.
